name: FALL IN LOVE3
description:
Casual gameplay"FALL IN LOVE3" has a very classic gameplay, you need to find all the differences in the 2 pictures to pass the level! The game operation is also very simple, just use the mouse to click on the different parts of the picture, no need
Too difficult to operate, very suitable for weekend leisure time to play.Colorful illustrationsThe illustrations used in the game levels are all beautiful girls and they all have their own unique style. The main goal of the game is to collect all the pictures of beautiful girls through all the levels. You need to carefully observe them with the naked eye to pass the level faster. Some of the differences are on their breasts or more hidden places.
Produced by "Origin team", it must be a fine product.
